text: Being alone feels good  I m not sure about you guys  but being alone for long periods of time is one of my favourite things  The idea of being by myself is one that I love and that I always have I do enjoy others companies  but by the time I leave them I think to myself  yeah but i could have been practicing so and so  or   I could have watched so much of so and so I m not sure if others are like this  and I wouldn t consider myself  introverted  just i prefer being alone to being with others
summary: Being alone for long periods of time is one of my favourite things. I don't consider myself introverted but I prefer being alone to being with others. I enjoy others companies but by the time I leave them I think to myself that I could have been doing something else.
cleaned: long period time favourite thing not consider introvert prefer enjoy company time leave think
